Package com.inexture.Servlets

package com.inexture.Servlets
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminServlet
    Admin servlet class.
    AuthEmailServlet
    This is called by ajax in registration page to check if email is already taken or not.
    DeleteServlet
    It deletes the user based on user id clicked button by admin.
    EditServlet
    It fetches all the data of user based on email address when user or admin clicks edit profile.
    LoginServlet
    It fetches the email and password from the database table and checks if this is user or admin, and redirects them to their respective page.
    LogoutServlet
    It invalidates the session, so user/admin cannot access their details or functionalities.
    NewPasswordServlet
    It changes new password based on given email address for forgot password page.
    RegisterServlet
    It registers the new user after checking the validation and redirects them to admin/login page based on session.
    ResetPasswordServlet
    It finds the user based on given email, birthdate and security answers from reset password page.
    UpdateServlet
    It updates the user details from given inputs from register jsp page.
